sentence.text: RNA sequencing transcriptome analysis revealed that inflammatory mediators such as tumor necrosis factor (TNF)-Î± suppressed expression of R-spondin-1 (positive regulation of protein phosphorylation, a critical growth factor for intestinal epithelial cells) in regulation of double-strand break repair via homologous recombination-silenced YAMC cells in vitro.

entity.text: regulation of double-strand break repair via homologous recombination
